participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is passionate about teaching and enjoys sharing knowledge with her students. She is also adventurous and has aspirations of owning a sports car.
participant_1.background: I will be visiting the new natural history museum with my students. I wish to buy a corvette when I retire. I'm a homeowner who can fix your computer. I am a healthy weight. I was adopted when I was a baby.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: James is sociable and enjoys leisure activities with friends. He values reading and travel, showcasing a curious and reflective nature.
participant_2.background: I enjoy eating at the local pub on sunny days after a round of golf with my friends. My favorite thing to do is read, but I would be unable to do it if I were blind. I manage all the paperwork and incoming calls. I love to travel and capture moments with my camera. I'm not much of a fan of hot weather.

content.text: I'm a teacher and I'm going to visit a museum with my students today.
Oh that's cool. I love reading. What kind of things do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of things but I'm really into history and science.
That's really cool. I like to read fantasy novels.
Have you ever read the Lord of the Rings?
No, I haven't. I've heard good things about it though.
It's one of my favorites. It's a really long book but it's so good.
I might have to check it out sometime.
You should! I think you'd like it.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome!
Do you have any other recommendations?
Yeah, I have a bunch. What are you interested in?
I'm interested in history and science.
Have you read any of the books by Bill Bryson?
No, I haven't.
He's a really good writer and he has a lot of books about science and history. I really enjoyed his book about the history of the world in a few hundred pages.
That sounds interesting. I'll check it out.
You should! I think you'd like it.
Thanks for the recommendation
